node.title: Come on an underwater treasure hunt with Korea's haenyeo — the women of the sea
node.alt: A woman wearing scuba gear, with an orange vest and goggles on her head look down as she gets into the water.
node.description: The volcanic island of Jeju is a wild paradise home to haenyeo, the women of the sea. Follow us as we join the free divers on a treasure hunt along its winding coast.
node.content:
["", "
The\u00a0haenyeo\u00a0are an integral part of South Korea's Jeju island.(ABC News: Mitch\u00a0Woolnough)
", "Follow Korea's oldest free divers on their underwater treasure hunt.", "The volcanic island of Jeju\u00a0is a\u00a0wild paradise sitting just off the coast of\u00a0the Korean peninsula. It is\u00a0said\u00a0to be\u00a0plentiful in three things:\u00a0rock, wind and women.", "Each have been\u00a0instrumental in shaping\u00a0its success.", "The rock and wind represent the island itself, formed after\u00a0a volcanic eruption thousands of years ago and regularly at the mercy of a strong gale.", "The women are haenyeo,\u00a0which literally translates to women of the sea.", "", "
There are believed to be only a couple of thousand\u00a0haenyeo still working in South Korea.(ABC News: Mitch\u00a0Woolnough)
", "Since the 17th century, they have\u00a0made a living\u00a0from\u00a0free diving\u00a0along Jeju\u2019s winding coastline.", "Regarded as South Korea's first working mothers, it's speculated these women began diving at a time when the men of the island were\u00a0away gathering food or at war.", "Yoon Sook-nyeo has been a member of\u00a0haenyeo for more than 40 years.", "Now one of the group's leaders, she believes they have played an instrumental part in the island's history and development.", "\"For a long time, haenyeo have formed a community in the village,\" Yoon says.", "\"And when they enter the sea, they go in and out together, laugh and fight together, and live together like that.\"", "Haenyeo's knowledge\u00a0is passed down to younger generations in families, by local community groups, even at school.", "With thousands living on the island,\u00a0the women are divided into smaller groups and designated a particular spot of coastline to focus on. Leadership\u00a0can vary from group to group depending on its size.", "Sometimes the highest ranking members go\u00a0for dives while the lower rank\u00a0keeps watch from above.", "But haenyeo we travel with are part of a flatter power structure and dive closer to the shore.", "Status comes\u00a0with experience.", "The older women rotate leadership among themselves. The leader might occupy the best seat on the Korean-style heated floor as they get ready,\u00a0but the decision making seems democratic.", "", "
Yoon Sook-nyeo leads a group of 21 haenyeo on the island.(ABC News:\u00a0Mitch Woolnough)
", "Each group of haenyeo have a bulteok \u2014\u00a0a space where they meet in the morning.", "Where they dive that day is decided after they meet.", "Like many in the group, Lee Yu-jung views the 21 women\u00a0she dives with as\u00a0her\u00a0family.", "\"As the youngest, it's my job to make the coffee each morning,\" the 32-year-old says.", "\"I feel like I have 20 maternal grandmothers.\u00a0If my wetsuit is ripped, they\u2019ll help me fix it.\"", "Members start arriving from around 6am, taking dried clothing off the lines and applying sunscreen.", "Everyone\u00a0quickly falls into a comfortable rhythm. New arrivals are greeted with warm smiles as the women swap stories and speculate on the day ahead.", "Some will go and pray at the haesindang, a shrine to the sea god, asking for a safe dive\u00a0and\u00a0help in catching an abundance of fish.", "\"We are friends, but sometimes we fight,\" laughs Yoon after we witness a lively discussion carried out in the distinct accent of the island.", "At a sprightly 65 years old, she's a relative youngster among the women of the sea.", "The oldest current member of this group is 91.", "", "
Haenyeo all gather at a bulteok in the mornings, where they get\u00a0ready before their dives.(ABC News: Mitch\u00a0Woolnough)
", "", "
Two women gather at the haesindang, a shrine to the sea god, where some haenyeo pray before their dives.(ABC News: Mitch\u00a0Woolnough)
", "At its peak, it's believed about 23,000 haenyeo\u00a0were working the waters around the island.", "Now the third pillar of Jeju's proverb is under threat.", "The number of haenyeo has dwindled over the years, and currently stands at about 3,500.", "Many members are at an age where workers would be considering retirement. Less than 100 are aged under 50.", "Most young women on Jeju these days are choosing\u00a0to stay above the water to earn a living.", "They see\u00a0it as both a less dangerous and more lucrative option.", "But for the women of the sea, free diving isn't just a profession, it's a way of life.", "
The hunt for treasure
", "Haenyeo\u00a0take to the water at\u00a08am, having grown\u00a0accustomed to the bracing cold of the ocean.", "Donning\u00a0their\u00a0patched\u00a0up,\u00a0matching\u00a0wetsuits,\u00a0pink\u00a0fringed\u00a0masks,\u00a0and\u00a0yellow flippers,\u00a0the\u00a0women make the short walk to their diving spot for the day.", "All 21 members go diving at once, waiting for Yoon to signal it's time to move.", "", "
The island of Jeju is\u00a0famous for its\u00a0volcanic mountain\u00a0and the\u00a0beautiful blue waters that surround it.(ABC News: Mitch\u00a0Woolnough)
", "Then, one by one, they dive. The women\u00a0can swim as deep as 30 metres\u00a0and are known to hold their breath for up to three\u00a0minutes at a time as they\u00a0forage for\u00a0catch or hunt down the odd\u00a0wily\u00a0octopus.", "While they gather together and go out to dive as a group, each woman works on their own in the ocean.", "Depending on the time of the year,\u00a0Haenyeo can harvest for up to seven hours a day, 90 days of the year. Though in the cooler months that can halve.", "The only sign of their work to the casual\u00a0on-shore\u00a0observers are their distinctive\u00a0orange floats bobbing on the surface of the water.", "Attached\u00a0are nets, increasingly swollen\u00a0with their catch.", "\"Working at sea is like a treasure hunt,\" Lee Yu-jung says.", "\"The more I find, the more I can buy what I want, and I give my parents money by selling what I caught and sharing the delicious food.\"", "The type of catch changes throughout the year, depending on what's available.", "Urchins are the target from March through May, while haenyeo mostly gather\u00a0seaweed during the summer months.", "By October, when we visit with them, they have turned their attention to conches \u2013 sea snails.", "The women are conscious of sustainable collection while still etching out a living.", "But they face a bigger concern\u00a0while underwater:\u00a0overexertion.", "It is all too easy to miscalculate\u00a0your limits during a free dive, underestimating the\u00a0time it will take to reach the surface or overestimating the oxygen you have left.", "That's why training to be a member can take many years.", "According to Jeju city authorities, on average between five and 10 women lose their lives diving, each year.", "Even very experienced members\u00a0take medicine to avoid motion sickness in the rocky conditions.", "\"It's dangerous, but this is the skill we've learned. We dive when it's cold and when it's hot,\" one member says.", "", "
The female free divers\u00a0carry no\u00a0oxygen tanks\u00a0to aid them as they search for treasure in the ocean.(ABC News: Mitch\u00a0Woolnough)
", "", "
Haenyeo collect different \"treasures\" from the sea throughout the year, including seaweed and sea snails.(ABC News: Mitch\u00a0Woolnough)
", "Many have decades of experience and hard-earned knowledge of weather patterns and tides. They all have an opinion on where is best to hunt on any particular day.", "But haenyeo have noticed the water is changing. The temperature is slightly\u00a0warmer and certain fish are easier to spot.", "While in one sense that makes the early morning dives easier to bear, it's a source of anxiety for the group, who are concerned about how it\u00a0will impact their fishing grounds.", "
At the mercy of the climate
", "Jeju University professor Park Sang-ryul says the island and haenyeo, which are dependent on its health, are facing a crisis.", "The area is experiencing some of the fastest climate change in the world,\u00a0he says, with the\u00a0water temperature here\u00a0rising three times faster than the global climate change trend.", "According to Professor Park's research, the water temperature around the island has risen more than one\u00a0degree in the past 30 years.", "In total, it has risen by about two\u00a0degrees over the past 80 years.", "The\u00a0change could be potentially catastrophic for the area, he says,\u00a0as slight temperature changes in the ocean can have\u00a0a bigger impact than on land.", "\"A change of 1 degree in the ocean is considered to be a change of 10 degrees on land,\" he said.", "The changes have been so drastic that the seas have moved from being a temperate zone to now being subtropical.", "And already it's having an impact on sea life.", "\"There is a decrease in kelp forests and an increase in corals in the ocean,\" he said.", "The changes are not only limited to algae and plant life though,\u00a0with haenyeo noticing that creatures further up the food chain are suffering\u00a0as well.", "\"The sea in Korea is a cold sea. It used to be hard to see colourful fish, but these days they're everywhere,\" one of the free divers says.", "Leader Yoon says the change is most obvious in the underwater plants where \"five or six kinds of seaweeds have disappeared\".", "\"Too many species have disappeared even in the 40 years I have been around,\" she says.", "", "
Many haenyeo worry about how climate change will impact their fishing grounds.(ABC News:\u00a0Mitch Woolnough)
", "", "
Many haenyeo are passionate about their work but worry about changes to the water temperature.(ABC News: Mitch\u00a0Woolnough)
", "Jeju is one of the major tourism drawcards in South Korea, famous for its\u00a0volcanic mountain peak in the centre of the island and the relatively sedate beautiful blue waters that surround it.", "The island offers a reprieve to Koreans wanting to escape the hustle and bustle of their clogged cities.", "Tourism has brought more jobs to the island, with people needed to provide services to new visitors. But Jeju's popularity has come with a large environmental cost, particularly in the forms of increased pollution.", "Lee\u00a0regularly goes out with a group of like-minded divers to clean up some of the rubbish blighting the waters.", "For these expeditions she makes sure to use full scuba gear and an oxygen tank.", "The refuse they collect ranges from discarded fishing gear, bottles, car parts and a huge amount of plastic.", "\"We try to come out as much as possible,\" the young diver says.", "But there's always so much rubbish. And along with their anxiety over the changes happening in the\u00a0ocean, haenyeo fear for their future.", "
The last haenyeo?
", "As more young women have given up on the practice, many worry the women of the sea could die out completely.", "With their numbers dwindling, the group we travel with look out for new recruits like\u00a0Lee Yu-jung.", "At 32, she is young by haenyeo standards.\u00a0Three decades separate her from the second-youngest haenyeo in her group.", "", "
Lee\u00a0Yu-jung\u00a0is exceptionally young by current\u00a0haenyeo\u00a0standards.(ABC News: Mitch\u00a0Woolnough)
", "", "
Haenyeo harvest for up to seven hours a day, 90 days of the year.(ABC News:\u00a0Mitch\u00a0Woolnough)
", "Her father was a fisherman and this connection helped her to gain acceptance with the group.", "She joined as an intern, made possible\u00a0only with the unanimous support of all the women she free dives with.", "Lee\u00a0spent two years in the role training\u00a0and\u00a0passing milestones related to her skills before she could graduate into the main ranks.", "After\u00a0four years with the group, she says free diving is\u00a0not about the capacity to earn money.", "\"I was a quick-tempered person who got bored quickly when I started,\" Lee said.", "\"In the early days I used to spend time under water thinking about all the happy and sad things that were happening in my life.", "\"I was so lost in my thoughts I couldn't focus on my work.\"", "Lee talks about her work in transformative language. The hours she has since spent submerged in the water, controlling her breath, have altered her core.", "\"The older haenyeo told me I wasn't performing, that I would only ever be a low-level haenyeo. That motivated me,\" she said.", "\"I really learnt to be patient by working in the sea with them. I also learnt how to work hard.\"", "", "
Being a haenyeo\u00a0isn't just a profession but a way of life for some women on Jeju island.\u00a0(ABC News: Mitch\u00a0Woolnough)
", "At 75, Yang Gye-ran is a more seasoned haenyeo member, having spent more than five decades\u00a0free diving.", "She\u00a0was born into haenyeo and has been a member since she was 19. Both her mother and sisters were also haenyeo but she says it's not just biology that binds the women together.", "\"We're like a family just because we work together here,\" she says.", "Not only is she haenyeo, but she's also a head of the local fishing village, which includes the fishermen.", "On the mainland of South Korea, that would cause something of a stir.", "But given the revered role of haenyeo on Jeju, it's not all that unusual.", "Even at an age when most would be thinking about retiring,\u00a0Yang\u00a0says she can't spend too much time away from the ocean.", "\"No matter how the sea changes, I like it. It feels so good to go to the sea,\" she says.", "\"Haenyeo get sick on land. My legs hurt, my body hurts, but when I go into the sea, the pain goes away.\"", "
Credits:\u00a0
", "Story:\u00a0Carrington Clarke", "Photography:\u00a0Mitch Woolnough", "Producer:\u00a0Sookyoung Lee", "Digital production and editing: Lucia Stein"]
